snippet: Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo, cheered on by Vice President Joseph R. Biden Jr., announced more than 1,00o projects that he said would make New York better prepared for future storms.
abstract: New York Gov Andrew M Cuomo, cheered on by Vice Pres Joseph R Biden Jr, talks of more than 1,000 projects that he says will make state better prepared for future storms; drawing on lessons from Hurricane Sandy, Cuomo outlines how New York will spend more than $16 billion in federal disaster aid on items like high-tech weather stations and seals for entrances to subway stations.
lead_paragraph: Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo, cheered on by Vice President Joseph R. Biden Jr., announced more than 1,00o projects that he said would make New York better prepared for future storms.

headline.main: Cuomo, Joined by Biden, Details Disaster Aid Plans
headline.print_headline: Cuomo, Joined by a Cheerleader, Details Disaster Aid Plans
